active_incidents.title: Some users in Norway unable to connect to Slack

notes.body: We’re getting reports that this has been resolved for most users. We’re continuing to monitor this closely and we’ll keep you posted.

We believe the connectivity trouble seems to be on our upstream service provider. We're keeping a close eye on this, and we'll keep you posted as soon as we have more information. We're sorry for the disruption.
Some users in Norway are experiencing issues connecting to Slack. We're currently investigating, and we'll share more information as soon as it becomes available. Apologies for the inconvenience.
